BugInstance.message: Class org.apache.shardingsphere.driver.DriverRegisterException defines a computed serialVersionUID that doesn't equate to the calculated value

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.driver.data.pipeline.datasource.creator.ShardingSpherePipelineDataSourceCreator.enableStreamingQuery(YamlRootConfiguration) puts non-String values into a Properties object
org.apache.shardingsphere.driver.executor.DriverJDBCExecutor.accumulate(List): 1st parameter 'updateResults' could be declared as java.lang.Iterable instead
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.driver.executor.batch.BatchExecutionUnit.hashCode() stores return result in local before immediately returning it

org.apache.shardingsphere.driver.executor.batch.BatchPreparedStatementExecutor.isSameDataSourceAndSQL(BatchExecutionUnit, JDBCExecutionUnit): 2nd parameter 'jdbcExecutionUnit' could be declared as org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.executor.sql.execute.engine.SQLExecutionUnit instead
This use of java/sql/Statement.executeUpdate(Ljava/lang/String;)I can be vulnerable to SQL injection (with JDBC)
This use of java/sql/Statement.executeQuery(Ljava/lang/String;)Ljava/sql/ResultSet; can be vulnerable to SQL injection (with JDBC)

Constrained method org.apache.shardingsphere.driver.jdbc.adapter.AbstractPreparedStatementAdapter.setCharacterStream(int, Reader) converts checked exception to unchecked instead of another allowable checked exception

Constrained method org.apache.shardingsphere.driver.jdbc.adapter.AbstractPreparedStatementAdapter.setCharacterStream(int, Reader, int) converts checked exception to unchecked instead of another allowable checked exception

Constrained method org.apache.shardingsphere.driver.jdbc.adapter.AbstractPreparedStatementAdapter.setCharacterStream(int, Reader, long) converts checked exception to unchecked instead of another allowable checked exception

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.driver.jdbc.adapter.AbstractStatementAdapter.accumulate() creates Boxed primitive from primitive only to cast to another primitive type

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.driver.jdbc.core.connection.ConnectionManager.createConnections(String, DataSource, int, TransactionConnectionContext) throws alternative exception from catch block without history

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.driver.jdbc.core.connection.ConnectionManager.createDataSourcePropertiesMap(Collection, Collection, DataSourceProperties, String) does not presize the allocation of a collection

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.driver.jdbc.core.driver.DriverDataSourceCache.get(String) checks a map with containsKey(), before using get()
